department.ch: 法律與政府研究所碩士班

goal.en: This course will enable students to understand the philosophy of the university and the nature of learning, and then study the methods of dissertation writing, such as the way of collecting data, the role of literature review, determining research questions and purposes, setting research structure and chapter arrangement, etc. Assist students to face academic research problems and complete dissertation projects.
goal.ch: 本課程將使學生夠理解大學的理念、學問的本質，進而研討論文寫作之方法，如蒐集資料的途徑、文獻回顧的作用、決定研究問題與目的，設定研究架構與章節安排等，協助同學面對學術研究上的問題，並完成論文計畫。

content.en:
Course description.
Choose a research topic.
Hands-on research, literature review.
Research methods and architecture.
The conclusion and recommendations of the paper.
Thesis writing and preparation for final exams.
Thesis writing discuss.
Students report dissertation projects.
content.ch:
課程說明。
選擇研究主題。
動手找資料、文獻回顧。
研究方法與架構。
論文的結論與建議。
論文寫作與心理、口試的準備。
論文寫作研討。
學生報告論文計畫。

grading.en: Attendance and class discussion (10%) / submission of final proposal paper (90%).
grading.ch: 出席、報告與參與討論佔10%，期末書面報告佔90%。 期中書面大綱或期末書面報告請於口頭報告當日繳交給老師。「電子檔」則於口頭報告一天前上傳新ee-class系統「討論區」的欄位中。
